SELECT ServerIP AS "ServerIP" , ErrorKind AS "ErrorKind" , ErrorTime AS "ErrorTime" , ErrorMessage AS "ErrorMessage" , ErrorStackTrace AS "ErrorStackTrace" , ProcessInsID AS "ProcessInsID" , B.FormInstID AS "FormInstID" , ErrorID AS "ErrorID" FROM jwf_error A INNER JOIN jwf_process B ON A.ProcessInsID = B.ProcessID WHERE 1=1 AND DeleteTime IS NULL
AND ErrorTime >=#{txtSDate} AND ErrorTime <= TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(#{txtSDate} ,'0')+1, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND ErrorMessage LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND ErrorMessage LIKE '%'||#{icoSearch}||'%'
AND EXISTS ( select 'x' from jwf_forminstance fi where fi.forminstid = b.forminstid
and fi.EntCode = #{EntCode}
)
